all_text_timv: 880-01 Survive style 5+ / seisaku Dentsū, Tōhoku Shinsha, Nihon Terebi, Tugboat ; written by Tada Taku ; directed by Sekiguchi Gen. 880-02 Japanese title on container: Sabaibu sutairu 5+ Japan naf 880-03 [Japan] : [Jeneon Entateinmento?], ©2004. 1 videodisc (120 min.) : sound, color ; 4 3/4 in. two-dimensional moving image tdi rdacontent video v rdamedia videodisc vd rdacarrier On title frame "+" is superscript. Special features: Trailers, staff and cast profiles. Cinematography, Shiguma Makoto ; art, Yamaguchi Osamu ; music, James Shimoji. Asano Tadanobu, Hashimoto Reika, Koizumi Kyōko, Abe Hiroshi, Kishibe Ittoku. Tadanobu Asano, Reika Hashamoto, Kyoko Koizumi, Hiroshi Abe, Ittoku Kishibe, Yumi Asou, Kanji Tsuda, Yoshiyuki Morishita, Jai West, Yoshiyoshi Arakawa, Vinnie Jones, Shinichi Chiba. Five separate comedies featuring eccentric characters and unreal situtations eventually intersect into a single larger narrative. DVD, NTSC, all regions; widescreen (1.85:1) presentation; Dolby Digital 5.1; DTS 5.1. No public performance rights.  Classroom instruction and home use permitted.
